kickstart.description: blat - http://genome.ucsc.edu bowtie - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net bowtie2 - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2 bwa - http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net GenomeAnalysisTK - http://www.broadinstitute.org/gatk samtools - http://samtools.sourceforge.net soapdenovo - http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapdenovo.html velvet - http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~zerbino/velvet gmap-gsnap (Genomic Mapping and Alignment Program,Genomic Short-read Nucleotide Alignment Program http://research-pub.gene.com/gmap/ trinity (Inchworm, Chrysalis,Butterfly) http://trinityrnaseq.sourceforge.net Cufflinks http://cufflinks.cbcb.umd.edu SOAPsnp http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapsnp.html Tophat http://tophat.cbcb.umd.edu fastx http://hannonlab.cshl.edu/fastx_toolkit spades http://bioinf.spbau.ru/en/spades picard http://picard.sourceforge.net/ bamtools http://https://github.com/pezmaster31/bamtools picard http://picard.sourceforge.net biopython http://biopython.org fastqc http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc plink http://pngu.mgh.harvard.edu/~purcell/plink bismark http://http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/bismark bssseeker http://pellegrini.mcdb.ucla.edu/BS_Seeker/ htseq http://www-huber.embl.de/users/anders/HTSeq rnastar https://code.google.com/p/rna-star trimmomatic http://www.usadellab.org/cms/?page=trimmomatic
